vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman of the Moabites living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Rut.1.4; married to Mahlon (H4248) and Boaz (H1162);
mother of: Obed (H5744)
Also named: Rhouth<\i> (Ῥούθ "Ruth" G4503)
§ Ruth = "friendship"
daughter-in-law of Naomi, wife of Boaz, and grandmother of David
vocabInfos._es_Definition: de Moab; esposa de Mahlón, hijo de Elimélec
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
路得 这个陰性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "友誼"
拿俄米的媳婦,波阿斯的妻子,也是大衛的祖母
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
路得 这个阴性专有名词在原文的意思是 "友谊"
拿俄米的媳妇,波阿斯的妻子,也是大卫的祖母
